body_html: loss is a fine name, I think they should both be 'loss' so that they appear on the same plot and are able to see how training loss compares to test loss. I found a fix for the ciphar code by adding a name-scope thats based on the training mode. the loss_1 name was coming in due to the 'loss' op already existing.
body_text: loss is a fine name,  I think they should both be 'loss' so that they appear on the same plot and are able to see how training loss compares to test loss.   I found a fix for the ciphar code by adding a name-scope thats based on the training mode.  the loss_1 name was coming in due to the 'loss' op already existing.
body: loss is a fine name,  I think they should both be 'loss' so that they appear on the same plot and are able to see how training loss compares to test loss.   I found a fix for the ciphar code by adding a name-scope thats based on the training mode.  the loss_1 name was coming in due to the 'loss' op already existing.
